string.text: Get Next Task
Receive your next task.
Yes, a colleague of mine is in need of your assistance.
Good luck stalker.
Tukarev %s Experiment
Harvest a %s and return it to Tukarev.
I need to perform an experiment on a particular mutant. I need you to hunt one down for me.
Find me a %s. I will reward you well if you succeed.
You have done well. This is exactly what I needed. Take this as your reward.
Find Missing Scientist
Search for the missing scientist.
One of my scientists is missing. He went out on a research expedition and never returned. Here is the area he was researching, search there and see if you can find him.
Thank you stalker.
Recover Stolen PDA for Tukarev
Tukarev had a PDA stolen that contained important research. Find it and return it to him.

Bandits broke into one of our mobile labs and looted it. One of the things they took was a PDA that has some research data on it that is very important. I have received a tip as to where they might have stashed it. Check it out. If you find the PDA I will reward you for its return.
Excellent! You have done well.
Search Jupiter Underground
Recover the research documents lost in Jupiter Underground.
One of our top scientists was killed in the underground passage while making his way back from Pripyat. He was carrying some important research with him. I need you to find it and bring it to me.
Excellent work. You have done well.
Get Next Task
Receive your next task.
I need you to pay a visit to a stalker. Ask what you can do for him. He will pay you well.
Good luck stalker.
%s Arms Dealer
Loki needs %s delivered to him.
Freedom is having a difficult time maintaining a foot hold up here. I need weapons. Lots of them.
I need a few %ss. If you can find a way to get them up here past the Brain Scorcher I will be willing to pay.
You have done well. The more rifles I have the better I sleep. Take this payment.
Clear the Monolith Beachhead
Clear the designated area of any Monolith fighters in preparation for Freedom's main assault.
We are preparing an invasion of Monolith territory. I want you to clear an area for us so our main assault force can move in.
Well done! Now we can begin our invasion! Well, not now, later today... maybe tomorrow. Anyway, thanks bro.
Hunt for a %s for Loki
Loki has requested a %s to protect one of his men.
I'm sending one of the boys on a mission that will require him to have more protection than our best suits can offer. I need a particular artefact to protect him.
Bring me a %s. If you can find one I will compensate you well for it.
Ah, perfect. Good job bro.
Search Monolith Control Center
Search the secret lab within Chernobyl NPP for documents relating to a prototype weapon.

There are rumors that plans for a new weapon exist inside a secret lab within Chernobyl NPP. We must retrieve them from the Monolith if we are to stand a chance against them. I know how grave the risks are, but if you are willing to capture the documents I will reward you well.
Excellent work. You have done well.
Исследование аномалий
Получить сканер у Тукарева.
Доставить сканер.
Доставить сканер на Затон.
Разместить сканер.
Доложить о выполнении.

Вы как нельзя кстати! Наша группа пытается найти взаимосвязь между выбросами и появлением артефактов, проводя исследования некоторых особо крупных аномальных образований в этой местности. К сожалению, уровень подготовки нашего исследовательского отряда оставляет желать лучшего, потому нам срочно требуется доброволец для выполнения следующей миссии: необходимо получить у Тукарева специальный сканер, а затем доставить и разместить его неподалёку от одной из вышеупомянутых аномалий, координаты которой я отмечу у Вас в КПК.
Желаете продолжить работу над установкой сканеров? У нас ещё осталось несколько слабо изученных аномалий. Оборудование, как и обычно, сможете получить у Тукарева.

Вы прекрасно поработали, теперь мы получаем данные со всех окрестностей Юпитера! Ах, если бы только была возможность расширить наши возможности и получить информацию от более удалённых областей… На данный момент нас особенно интересуют территории Затона, но никто из сталкеров туда в ближайшее время не отправляется. Быть может, вы нам вновь поможете с нашими дальнейшими исследованиями..? Суть задачи останется прежней - необходимо будет всего лишь установить сканер в определённой области.
Да, нам всё ещё необходимо собрать как можно больше информации. Надеюсь, у Тукарева осталось достаточно датчиков.
Похоже, мой дорогой друг, это Ваше финальное задание для нашего исследования. Осталось установить последний датчик в единственной оставшейся не исследованной нами аномальной области.
Замечательно! Ко мне уже поступает первичная информация. Вот ваша награда.
Да, я уже вижу, что новый сканер исправно работает. Спасибо, я очень признателен.

Ах, я совершенно не ожидал увидеть Вас так скоро. Секунду, сейчас я проверю работу датчика… Да, превосходно! Сигнал с Затона поступает слабый, но вполне стабильный! Пожалуйста, примите мою благодароность.
Ещё один сканер установлен? Очень хорошо. Вот, примите небольшую компенсацию на ваши расходы.

Что же, вот и подошло к концу наше с Вами сотрудничество. Благодаря Вашим трудам, наши исследования наконец сдвинулись с мёртвой точки. Такое огромное количество аномалий для исследования, такие объёмные потоки данных для обработки! Я даже представить не могу, какие великие открытия нас могут ожидать в будущем! И всё это - благодаря Вам. Пожалуйста, примите скромную благодарность от всего нашего научного состава - Вы её более чем заслужили.
Я должен получить сканер для исследования аномалий.
Держи. Герман сказал - выдать один.
Special Delivery
You need to deliver a message. How did you get caught up in the middle of this?
Alright, I have a very simple job for you. I need you to deliver a message to my pal, Ashot. He needs his PDA fixed - tell him to bring it over here.
Haha, we were just playing a prank on you, stalker. I can't believe you put up with this shit for so long.
Escort Jupiter Scientists
Scientists have hired you to guide them to a specific location for study. Once their research has been successfully conducted, return them safely to camp.
We need an experienced stalker to lead a few of our the colleagues out into the field for study. Are you up for the task?
Thank you for your protection, stalker. Please, take this as a token of our gratitude.
Find the %s Artefact
You have been asked to retrieve the %s artefact. Bring it back to the ecologists if you happen to get your hands on one.
We are looking for certain kinds of artefacts. If you are interested, I will tell you what we need.
I need you to bring us back a %s. You ever heard of it? We have something we can give you in return that I think you will find useful.
Great! You've found exactly what we are looking for. Take this suit, it offers great protection against the Zone and I'm sure you can command a good price for it.
Brains vs Brawn
Lead a group of Ecologist guards into battle against Bandits.

My researchers are in constant peril. There are bandits all over the area and no one seems to be doing a damn thing about it. I want you to clear the area with some of my men. Don't let their A-levels fool you, these boys know how to fight. Now get out there and lead them to victory!
Excellent work. Thank you.
Lead Mutant Hunt

Mutants have been spotted near this location making the area dangerous for some of the locals. You have been tasked to lead a hunting party to reduce the mutant threat within the area. Report back to Trapper after the job is done.
I have organized a hunt to help keep the area around Yanov a bit safer by depopulating the various mutant lairs found in area. I need someone experienced to lead it. Would you like the job?
Thank you, stalker. The area will be much safer for others because of you. Here is your payment.
Deadliest Game
Trapper has a high value target that needs to be eliminated.
I have a dangerous threat that needs to be eliminated. Not a mutant this time, but a man. He will not be easy to get to but I promise to pay you well. Are you up for the job?
Excellent work stalker. Here is your payment.
Find a %s for Trapper
Trapper is looking for a specific firearm in perfect condition. Return to him if you find one.
One of my hunters is in the market for a specific firearm that I don't have available. Would you be able to track one down for me?
I need a %s. The trapper who wants it goes after dangerous game so he needs it to be in excellent condition. I can pay you well if you find one.
Ah, perfect. This will do nicely. Here is the money I promised you.
%s Trophy Hunt
Trapper says he will pay well if I can bring him a %s.
I have a bounty out on a particular type of mutant. Are you interested?
Kill this mutant and bring me its %s and I will pay you well, stalker.
Ah, another threat eliminated and a new decoration for the camp. Well done, stalker.
Find %s for Nitro
%s are required by Nitro to install basic equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
I need new tools, stalker, something that is hard to come by in the Zone. If you are interested in helping me out, I will tell you what I need.
I need a set of basic tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me I will be grateful, I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Perfect! This is just what I need, stalker. If you need any of your equipment fine-tuned, now I can do it properly.
Find %s for Nitro
%s are required by Nitro to install advanced equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
The toolset you brought me is great, but it doesn't have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
I need an %s. I'm not sure where you can get one of these, but if you can find one, I need it.
Whoa! You found a nice set of tools for me. Here, I promised you some money in return.
Find %s for Nitro
%s are required by Nitro to install expert equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
The toolset you brought me is great, but it doesn't have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
I need an %s. I'm not sure where you can get one of these, but if you can find one, I need it.
Whoa! You found a nice set of tools for me. Here, I promised you some money in return.
